text: vastavaniki i prapancika jivitanni ila polcavaccu: Memu akasam nundi nitini kuripincaga dani nundi bhumilo manavulaku mariyu pasuvulaku tinataniki, vividha rakala cetlu cemalu perugutayi. Appudu bhumi tana alankaranto vardhillutu undaga, dani yajamanulu niscayanga, adi tama vasanlo undanukuntaru; alanti samayanlo akasmattuga ratri putano leka pagati putano ma tirpu vastundi. Appudu memu danini - ninnati varaku emi leni - kosivesina pantapolanga marcivestamu. I vidhanga memu ma sucanalanu alocince prajala koraku spastanga vivaristamu
